itunes:title: APR 07 2022 – OK GROOMER: CORPORATE MEDIA LOSES IT OVER ANTI-GROOMING BILL
title: APR 07 2022 – OK GROOMER: CORPORATE MEDIA LOSES IT OVER ANTI-GROOMING BILL
description:
Atlantic writer Anne Applebaum refuses to address disinformation regarding Hunter Biden’s laptop scandal at the 2022 Disinformation and Erosion Conference, and corporate media defends ‘grooming’ children while blaming conservatives for ‘smearing’ the left as pedophiles. Meanwhile, indefinite lockdowns continue in Shanghai despite rebellion from residents, and Kim Kardashian is called out over death penalty cases.


Here’s your Daily dose of Human Events with @JackPosobiec

For more on Turning Point USA's Socialism Sucks series, ‘China: The World’s Loan Shark’ go to https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=6s4L1Q5yN04
